original_text: When the demons came out of the man, they went into the pigs, and the herd rushed down the steep bank into the lake and was drowned.
korean_text: 귀신들이 그 사람에게서 나와 돼지에게로 들어가니 그 떼가 비탈로 내리달아 호수에 들어가 몰사하거늘

sentences.original_text: When the demons came out of the man
and the herd rushed down the steep bank
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 돼지 떼는 가파른 언덕을 뛰어내렸습니다

sentences.original_text: into the lake and was drowned
